meanings.sent1: The picture fell, so I rehanged it on the wall.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the wind rehanged the chimes on the porch.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rehanged the same painting upside down!
meanings.sent4: The spider rehanged its web with precision after it was disturbed.
meanings.sent5: She rehanged the curtains to let more light into the room.

meanings.sent1: The rehanged painting looked even more beautiful in the new frame.
meanings.sent2: The rehanged banner fluttered in the breeze at the event.
meanings.sent3: The rehanged hammock was now the favorite spot in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The rehanged lights illuminated the garden like twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The rehanged sign caught everyone's attention with its bold colors.
